Info.Authors: Gav Thorpe, Space McQuirk and Tuomas Pirinen
Info.Description:
The Dark Elves, or the Druchii as they call themselves in their own tongue, also known as the Naggarothi or the "Dark Ones", are one of the most ancient, powerful, and certainly the most sadistic of the three Elven civilisations of the world.

In the bleak, chilly lands of the continent of Naggaroth in the New World lies the Dark Elven kingdoms of the Witch King Malekith, a realm born from the depths of malice and hate, a kingdom that seeks nothing more than to despoil a world its people believe loathes their existence. With malevolent eyes, the Dark Elves watch this dying world, knowing it is their birthright to rule all that they survey and those that live upon it are born to do nothing more than to grovel at their feet.

The Druchii are raiders, slavers and heartless reavers of the first degree, their every whim being nothing more than to sow misery and pain to all that oppose them, for misery and pain is the very lifeblood of their existence. Thus do their Black Arks and Corsair Fleets ply the great waters of the world, raiding and enslaving all before them as a tribute to their own avaricious desires

Weapon.Name: Executioner's Axe
Weapon.Rule: Strength double that of his target's Toughness
Weapon.Description: When rolling to wound in close combat and for armour save modifier purposes, the wielder counts as having a Strength double that of his target's Toughness. However, the Executioner's Axe is two-handed and the wielder always strikes last except in the turn he the turn he charges

Weapon.Name: Venom Sword
Weapon.Rule: Any model which loses a wound to the Venom Sword (after saves, etc) must roll equal to or under its Toughness on 2D6 or is automatically slain

Weapon.Name: Blade of Ruin
Weapon.Description: No armour saves may be taken against hits from the Sword of Ruin. Ward saves may be taken as normal

Weapon.Name: Hydra Blade
Weapon.Description: A character wielding the Hydra Blade gains D3 additional attacks (roll each Close Combat phase the Hydra Blade is used)

Weapon.Name: Crimson Death
Weapon.Description: A model wielding Crimson Death always strikes with Strength 6. No other modifiers will ever reduce this. Requires two hands to use

Weapon.Name: Lifetaker
Weapon.Rule: Crossbow hits on a 2+, may re-roll to wound
Weapon.Description: Lifetaker is treated like an ordinary repeater crossbow, with the following additional rules. Lifetaker always hits on 2+, regardless of To Hit modifiers. You may re-roll failed rolls to wound with Lifetaker. Remember that a dice can never be re-rolled more than once

Weapon.Name: Web of Shadows
Weapon.Rule: Enemy automatically takes 2D6 Strength 3 hits, one use only
Weapon.Description: One use only. The character uses the Web of Shadows instead of making any normal attacks that round. When used, one model in base contact with the character automatically takes 2D6 Strength 3 hits. A character with a Web of Shadows may also take an ordinary close combat weapon (but not another magic weapon)

Weapon.Name: Heartseeker
Weapon.Description: The character may re-roll all missed attacks with Heartseeker. Remember a dice can never be re-rolled more than once

Weapon.Name: Chill Blade
Weapon.Rule: Any model wounded may not attack for the rest of that combat round
Weapon.Description: Any model wounded by a Chill Blade (after saves, etc) may not attack for the rest of that combat round

Weapon.Name: Dark sword
Weapon.Rule: Any model losing one or more wounds becomes subject to the rules for stupidity for the remainder of the battle
Weapon.Description: Any model losing one or more wounds (after saves, etc) to the Dark Sword becomes subject to the rules for stupidity for the remainder of the battle

Armour.Name: Armour of Living Death
Armour.Description: The Armour of Living Death counts as heavy armour, giving a 5+ armour save, which can be combined with other armour as normal. In addition, the model has +1 Toughness and +1 Wound

Armour.Name: Armour of Eternal Servitude
Armour.Description: This light armour gives a basic 6+ save, which can be combined with other armour as normal. In addition, the wearer can regenerate

Shield.Name: Shield of Ghrond
Shield.Rule: All hits the character suffers will be resolved with -1 Strength
Shield.Description: The Shield of Ghrond is treated like a normal shield, and in addition all hits the character suffers will be resolved with -1 Strength

Armour.Name: Armour of Darkness
Armour.Description: This armour includers a shield and gives a save of 2+ which cannot be improved in any way

Armour.Name: Blood Armour
Armour.Rule: For every inflicted wound in close combat, armour save is improved by one point
Armour.Description: Blood Armour is treated as a suit of normal heavy armour (5+ save) and can be combined with other armour as normal. For every unsaved wound the wearer inflicts, their save is improuved by 1 (to 4+ then 3+, etc) up to maximum of 1+

Additional.Name: Black Amulet
Additional.Rule: If ward save test is passed, the attacking model suffers 1 wound instead (with no armour save allowed)
Additional.Description: The wearer has a 5+ Ward save against close combat hits. If the wearer of the Black Amulet passes his Ward save then the attacking model suffers 1 wound instead (with no armour save allowed)

Additional.Name: Deathmask
Additional.Description: The wearer of mask causes terror

Additional.Name: Crown of Black Iron
Additional.Rule: Completely immune to the effects of Light Magic and High Magic
Additional.Description: The character has a 5+ Ward save. In addition to this, the wearer is completely immune to the effects of Light Magic and High Magic spells. Note that this is not a Dispel and thus other models (excluding the character's mount) may be affected by High Magic and Light Magic.

Additional.Name: Seal of Ghrond
Additional.Description: The seal of Ghrond adds one dice to the Dispel dice pool of the army

Additional.Name: Ring of Hotek
Additional.Rule: Any magic user (friend or foe) attempting to cast a spell within 6" of the wearer will miscast on the roll of any double
Additional.Description: Any magic user (friend or foe) attempting to cast a spell within 6" of the wearer will miscast on the roll of any double. If they roll a double 6 they cast the spell (with Irresistible Force) and then suffer a Miscast

Weapon.Name: Rubric of Dark Dimensions
Weapon.Rule: Bound spell, power level 3, one use only: all enemy models in base contact must roll equal to or under their Strength on a D6 or be slain
Weapon.Description: One use only. Bound spell, power level 5. All enemy models in base contact with the bearer must roll equal to or under their Strength on a D6 (6 always fails) or be sucked into the dimension of Eternal Nightmares (and count as slain!)

Additional.Name: Ring of Darkness
Additional.Rule: Bound spell, power level 4, remains in play: attacks in close combat against the wearer require a 6 to hit
Additional.Description: Attacks in close combat against the wearer require a 6 to hit regardless of Weapon Skills and modifiers. Remains in play

Additional.Name: Crystal of Midnight
Additional.Rule: Bound spell, power level 3, one use only: enemy Wizard must pass a Leadership test on 3D6 otherwise they forget one randomly spell
Additional.Description: One use only. Nominate a Wizard anywhere on the table. The Wizard must pass a Leadership test on 3D6 otherwise he forgets one randomly determined spell for the rest of the battle

Arcane.Name: Soulstone
Arcane.Rule: Immune to the effects of her first Miscast
Arcane.Description: A Soulstone makes the Sorceress immune to the effects of her first Miscast. Note that a Miscast spell still fails regardless of the actual dice score rolled

Arcane.Name: Black Staff
Arcane.Rule: There is no maximum number of Power dice to attempt a spell
Arcane.Description: There is no maximum number of Power dice the wielder can use to attempt a spell

Arcane.Name: Darkstar Cloak
Arcane.Description: The cloak gives the Sorceress +1 power dice in each of her own Magic phase. Only she may use this extra dice

Arcane.Name: Tome of Furion
Arcane.Description: The Tome of Furion grants its bearer one additional spell

Banner.Name: Banner of Nagarythe
Banner.Description: This standard adds +1 to the combat resolution of all units withn 6" and the unit carrying the banner is Unbreakable

Banner.Name: Hydra Banner
Banner.Description: All models in the unit (including mounts) gain +1 Attack in the first round of any hand-to-hand combat

Banner.Name: Dread Banner
Banner.Description: The unit carrying this standard causes fear

Banner.Name: Banner of Murder
Banner.Description: The unit adds +D6" into its charge moves. Declare charges first and then roll. If the charge is failed the unit will move forward its normal failed charge distance

Banner.Name: Standard of Slaughter
Banner.Description: The unit gains +D3 to its combat resolution the first time it charges

Weapon.Name: Manbane
Weapon.Rule: Counts their Strength as one higher than their target's Toughness, unless their Strength would normally be more than this, up to a maximum of Strength 6
Weapon.Description: A character with a weapon coated with Manbane always counts their Strength as one higher than their target's Toughness, unless their Strength would normally be more than this, up to a maximum of Strength 6. In effect, this means that they almost always wound opponents on a roll of 3+. This modified Strength is also used to calculate armour save modifiers

Weapon.Name: Black Lotus
Weapon.Rule: For every Wound suffers a enemy model (after saves, etc) also lose 1 point from all of their other characteristics except Movement
Weapon.Description: For every Wound a model suffers from a weapon poisoned with Black Lotus (after saves, etc) they also lose 1 point from all of their other characteristics except Movement. This lasts for the rest of the battle

Weapon.Name: Dark Venom
Weapon.Description: The model is considered to have Poisoned Attacks

Additional.Name: Dance of Doom
Additional.Description: The model has a 5+ Ward save

Additional.Name: Touch of Death
Additional.Description: The model has the Killing Blow special ability

Weapon.Name: Rune of Khaine
Weapon.Description: The Rune of Khaine grants +1 Attack to its bearer. A model marked with the Rune of Khaine must always pursue fleeing enemies

Weapon.Name: Hand of Khaine
Weapon.Rule: Any one model in base contact will lose one Attack
Weapon.Description: Any one model (chosen by a Dark Elf player) in base contact will lose one Attack. Against mounted models, the Dark Elf player must choose either the mount/monster or the rider. If the model has several types of attack (an extra bite, for example) the Dark Elf player chooses which type of attack is lost. Models which are immune to psychology are not affected by the Hand of Khaine

Additional.Name: Witchbrew
Additional.Rule: Enemy units cannot claim the +1 combat resolution bonuses for outnumbering, flank and rear attacks or higher ground
Additional.Description: Hags only. The Hag and her unit drink the Witchbrew before the battle. Enemy units cannot claim the +1 combat resolution bonuses for outnumbering, flank and rear attacks or higher ground

Weapon.Name: Cry of War
Weapon.Rule: A unit charged character must pass a Leadership test or reduce their Weapon Skill by -1 for the duration of that Close Combat phase
Weapon.Description: A unit charged by a warrior with a Cry of War must pass a Leadership test or reduce their Weapon Skill by -1 (to a minimum of 1) for the duration of that Close Combat phase

Lord.Name: Malekith
Lord.Description: Malekith, the Witch King of Naggaroth

Original.Rule: If your army is led by Malekith, Black Guard are no longer a 0-1 choice - you may include as many units as you have Rare choices
May re-roll missed close combat attacks against High Elves in any round of combat, not just the first round

HandWeapon.Name: Destroyer
HandWeapon.Rule: If Malekith hits an opponent with a magic weapon or with magic armour, instead of rolling to wound you may choose to destroy one item (opponent's choice)

Original.Rule: Always use Dark Magic, you may choose which four spells she has at the start of the battle
Adds +2 to all of her casting rolls
Any Witch Elves within 12" may use her Leadership value, as if she was their army General

Arcane.Name: Enchanting Beauty
Arcane.Rule: Any enemy model in base contact with Morathi at the start of round of combat must pass a Leadership test or have their WS reduced to 1 for the duration of that round

Lord.Name: Malus Darkblade
Lord.Description: Malus Darkblade, Scion of Hag Graef

Demon.Name: Tz'arkan
Demon.Rule: If Malus is in base contact with a friendly model and not in contact with the enemy in any close combat phase, roll a D6: on a 4+ Tz'arkan's murderous rage drives Malus to attack his allies
